alert.note: Alert for Labette; Neosho (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 5:27PM CDT until March 30 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Labette County in southeastern Kansas... Southeastern Neosho County in southeastern Kansas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 527 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mound Valley, or 7 miles west of Altamont, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Parsons, Altamont, Mound Valley, Galesburg, Lake Parsons, Dennis, South Mound and Big Hill Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
